text: Hazrat Sheikh Ahmed Ar-Rifai (1118-1182) was a Sufi master and saint. He founded the Rifai Sufi order.Sheikh Abu Bakr M Sibahi Tareekh i Tassawuf (Urdu:Historical Sufism) Lahore, 1966 He was born in the Hasen region of Iraq. He died and was buried in Northern Iraq near Tal Afar.Sibahi aa His shrine is respected by most Muslims, Shia or Sunni. However, in 2014, this shrine was destroyed by the ISIS terrorists. ==References== Category:1118 births Category:1182 deaths Category:Asian Sufis
